name: Santa'sHelper
0:
”Alexa, ask Santa's Helper have I been naughty or nice?”
”Alexa, ask Santa's Helper am I on the nice list?”
”Alexa, ask Santa's Helper for a fact”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: santa's helper
des:
Have you ever wondered if you're on Santa's naughty or nice list? Maybe you should ask!

If you want you can also ask for a Christmas fact
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
